title: Terms of Use | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Read more about the Terms of Use of this website.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
1. Thank you for visiting this Website (“The Website”). The Website is owned and maintained by the Singapore Institute of Technology (hereinafter “SIT”).
2. All access of any of The Website is governed by the terms and conditions below (“Terms”). If you do not accept any of these Terms, exit immediately. Continue only if you accept these terms.
3. In these Terms, the words “we”, “our” and “us” refer to SIT.
4. SIT reserves the right to change these Terms from time to time. Your use of The Website constitutes your agreement to any modified Terms.
5. The accessibility and operation of The Website relies on technologies outside our control. We do not guarantee continued accessibility or uninterrupted operation of The Website.

6. The Website is provided for general information only. We do not guarantee the timeliness, accuracy, completeness or reliability of any statements, opinion, representation or other information in The Website. You should do your own checks.

7. The materials located on The Website, including the information as well as software programmes available on or through it (“the Contents”), are protected by copyright, trademark and other forms of proprietary rights. All rights, title and interest in the Contents are owned by, licensed to and controlled by SIT.

8. Where appropriate, we use available technology to protect the security of communications made through The Website. We do not, however, accept liability for the security, authenticity, integrity or confidentiality of any transactions and other communications made through The Website.

9. Internet communications may be susceptible to interference or interception by third parties. Despite our best efforts, we make no warranties that The Website is free of infection by computer viruses or other unauthorised software.
10. We are not responsible or liable for the availability or content of any other internet site (not provided by us) linked to or from The Website. Access to any other site is at your own risk.
11. If you create a link or frame to The Website you do so your own risk.

12. Materials, including design, source codes, pages, documents and online graphics, audio and video in The Website are protected by law. The Intellectual property rights in the materials are owned or licensed to us. All rights reserved (© Singapore Institute of Technology).

13. Apart from any fair dealings for the purposes of private study, research, criticism or review, as permitted by law, no part of The Website may be reproduced or reused for any commercial purposes whatsoever without our prior written permission. The modification of the materials on The Website is prohibited.
We will not be liable for any loss or damage:
14. that you may incur on account of using, visiting or relying on any statement, opinion, representation or information in The Website;
15. resulting any delay in the operation or transmission, communications failure, Internet access difficulties malfunctions in equipment or software; or
16. the conduct or views of any person who accesses or uses The Website.

Exciting news! We are introducing new micro-credentials in Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Be among the first to know by registering your interest today!
SIT reserves the right to make changes to published course information, including dates, times, venues, fees and instructors without prior notice.
Singapore Institute of Technology. All Rights Reserved.

Terms of Use
AGREEMENT – TERMS
1. Thank you for visiting this Website (“The Website”). The Website is owned and maintained by the Singapore Institute of Technology (hereinafter “SIT”).
2. All access of any of The Website is governed by the terms and conditions below (“Terms”). If you do not accept any of these Terms, exit immediately. Continue only if you accept these terms.
3. In these Terms, the words “we”, “our” and “us” refer to SIT.
4. SIT reserves the right to change these Terms from time to time. Your use of The Website constitutes your agreement to any modified Terms.
ACCESS TO THE WEBSITE
5. The accessibility and operation of The Website relies on technologies outside our control. We do not guarantee continued accessibility or uninterrupted operation of The Website.
RELYING ON INFORMATION
6. The Website is provided for general information only. We do not guarantee the timeliness, accuracy, completeness or reliability of any statements, opinion, representation or other information in The Website. You should do your own checks.
7. The materials located on The Website, including the information as well as software programmes available on or through it (“the Contents”), are protected by copyright, trademark and other forms of proprietary rights. All rights, title and interest in the Contents are owned by, licensed to and controlled by SIT.
SECURITY
8. Where appropriate, we use available technology to protect the security of communications made through The Website. We do not, however, accept liability for the security, authenticity, integrity or confidentiality of any transactions and other communications made through The Website.
9. Internet communications may be susceptible to interference or interception by third parties. Despite our best efforts, we make no warranties that The Website is free of infection by computer viruses or other unauthorised software.
HYPERLINKS
10. We are not responsible or liable for the availability or content of any other internet site (not provided by us) linked to or from The Website. Access to any other site is at your own risk.
11. If you create a link or frame to The Website you do so your own risk.
INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
12. Materials, including design, source codes, pages, documents and online graphics, audio and video in The Website are protected by law. The Intellectual property rights in the materials are owned or licensed to us. All rights reserved (© Singapore Institute of Technology).
13. Apart from any fair dealings for the purposes of private study, research, criticism or review, as permitted by law, no part of The Website may be reproduced or reused for any commercial purposes whatsoever without our prior written permission. The modification of the materials on The Website is prohibited.
DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY
We will not be liable for any loss or damage:
14. that you may incur on account of using, visiting or relying on any statement, opinion, representation or information in The Website;
15. resulting any delay in the operation or transmission, communications failure, Internet access difficulties malfunctions in equipment or software; or
16. the conduct or views of any person who accesses or uses The Website.
